DOC.brief_summary: The so-called tension-free vaginal tape ( TVT ) , first describe Sweden 1996 , become standard operation worldwide treatment woman stress urinary incontinence . This tape place vagina behind pubic bone exit skin low abdomen , pubic bone . In 2001 urologist France propose pass similar tape laterally ( oppose behind pubic bone ) . This tape pass window pelvic bone ( so-called obturator foramen ) , call transobturator approach . It pass skin thigh ( oppose low abdomen ) . The reason modification avoid injure bladder , possibly , provide physiologic restoration continence mechanism . However , unclear whether lateral ( so-called transobturator approach ) good well initial approach behind pubic bone . The purpose present study compare standard ( retropubic ) newer ( transobturator ) approach placement tape treat woman stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: Retropubic vs. Transobturator Tension-free Vaginal Tape
DOC.detailed_description: After inform consent woman schedule surgery stress urinary incontinence randomize receive tension-free vaginal tape either retropubic transobturator approach .
